subclusters.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress and ROS as primary drivers of inflammation and vascular aging, highlighting cross-talk between oxidative stress and inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes the interaction between oxidative stress and inflammaging, with cellular senescence and SASP contributing to chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging in the context of oxidative stress, cellular senescence, and stem cell exhaustion, particularly in lung disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links inflammaging with cardiovascular aging, emphasizing oxidative stress markers and cardiac-specific inflammation biomarkers.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Connects inflammaging with vascular aging and ischemic stroke, highlighting decreased stress coping and oxidative damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details multiple causes of inflammaging including mitochondrial dysfunction and senescent cells, focusing on cardiovascular disease and oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Glycosylation-Linked Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on aberrant glycosylation of IgG and plasma proteins as drivers and biomarkers of inflammaging, linking glycosylation changes to inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Glycosylation-Linked Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes altered N-glycosylation of IgG (IgG-G0) as a pro-inflammatory factor that perpetuates inflammaging through immune activation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gut Microbiome and Barrier Dysfunction Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights the gut as a key site of inflammaging, with microbiome dysbiosis and barrier impairment driving systemic inflammation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuro-Immune-Endocrine Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on autonomic nervous system imbalance and neuroendocrine dysregulation as drivers of inflammaging and accelerated aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuro-Immune-Endocrine Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes neuroinflammation, immune cell infiltration, and IL2-mediated immune modulation in brain inflammaging and cognitive aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immune Gene Upregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on conserved innate immune gene overexpression and antimicrobial peptides as hallmarks of inflammaging across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes chronic low-grade inflammation driven by cytokines and dysregulated immune responses including immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on proinflammatory cytokines IL-6, IL-1β, TNF-α as markers and mediators of inflammaging, with sex hormone modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses inflammaging measured by circulating cytokines and highlights population variability in inflammatory signatures.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes the vicious cycle between cellular senescence, SASP cytokines, and chronic inflammation driving vascular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on genetic control of inflammatory response, immunosenescence, and cytokine markers predicting frailty and mortality.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights elevated inflammatory markers with age and accelerated inflammaging in progeroid syndrome, emphasizing cytokine-driven inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains inflammation as an antagonistic pleiotropy mechanism with lifetime infection exposure influencing inflammaging and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes sex/gender differences in innate and adaptive immunity changes that exacerbate inflammaging and senescent cell accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dysregulated immune responses and inflammatory pathways (NF-kB, NLRP3) driving inflammaging in periodontal disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Positions inflammaging as a mechanistic link to age-associated diseases, emphasizing systemic inflammation and therapeutic targeting.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes multiple sources of inflammatory stimuli driving chronic inflammation and aging, highlighting inflammation as a causal driver.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Psychosocial Stress-Linked Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links psychosocial stressors such as intimate partner violence to elevated inflammation and accelerated inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Introduces cold-inflammaging as a pre-phase of inflammaging, emphasizing homeostatic imbalance, SASP, gut microbiota, and molecular waste accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on immune dysregulation, cellular senescence with SASP, and epigenetic alterations contributing to inflammaging and metabolic disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes impaired resolution of inflammation due to macrophage dysfunction and reduced pro-resolving mediators leading to chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes geroprotective interventions targeting inflammation and metabolic reprogramming downstream of inflammaging and senescence.
